DOC.brief_title: Wettability Contact Lenses With Multi-Purpose Solution
DOC.criteria: Subjects normal eye successfully wear contact lens daily basis least two week prior study . Must wear lens minimum eight hour day Vision must correctable 20/30 ( snellen ) good eye distance soft contact lenses Use topical ocular OTC prescribe ocular medication Subjects current lid conjunctival infection , abnormality , inflammation , abnormal corneal opacity , significant lenticular inclusion , iritis , ocular disease condition , corneal surgery , cataract surgery , intraocular lens implant , glaucoma filtering surgery . Subjects use systemic medication , upper respiratory infection cold , history seasonal allergy significant ocular side effect
